description:
"Supernatural" is about to get a rare dose of estrogen. 女色角色向来很少的《邪恶力量》终于要加女性元素进来了。

When The CW's long-running hit series returns this fall for Season 10, a new female character named Rowena will recur, TVLine reports. So who is Rowena? CW电视台长寿美剧《邪恶力量》将会在今年迎来它的第十季，据TVLine报道，将会有一个名叫Rowena的女性角色出现在第十季。那么Rowena到底是谁呢?

According to the site, Rowena is "a tough but elegant." No word yet on whether she'll be a friend or foe to the Winchesters, but here's another interesting piece of info on this new character: The show is looking to cast an actress with a Scottish accent, or someone that can convincingly portray one. Does that mean Rowena will have a connection to Crowley's son Gavin? 据报道，Rowena是一个坚强却又优雅的女性。目前还没有其他消息描述她到底会是Winchester兄弟的朋友还是敌人，不过关于这个角色有一个很有趣的描述：剧组之前一直在寻找有苏格兰口音或者是能模仿苏格兰口音的演员。这是不是意味着Rowena和Crowley的儿子Gavin有些关系？

The Season 10 premiere is currently titled "Soul Survivor," so is there hope for Dean, who woke up in the Season 9 finale as a demon? Let's hope so.《邪恶力量》第十季首播集标题叫做《Soul Survivor》，这是不是意味着在第九季被魔鬼上身的Dean在第十季有望清醒过来呢？希望如此。

title: 《邪恶力量》第十季将出现全新女角色
